app_descript:
Brief: Join over 10 million players in the highly acclaimed action-puzzle game ZOOKEEPER BATTLE, now thrillingly competitive with its versus puzzle format. Dive into the simple yet captivating gameplay, where strategy and speed are key to mastering the art of animal matching and outwitting your real-time opponents. With a bounty of new features, such as event rankings, avatar customization, and a dynamic collection system, this free-to-play game offers a fresh and evolving experience for both long-time fans and newcomers alike.

  • ğŸ¢ My Zoo Feature: Create and enhance your very own zoo to impress and delight visitors ğŸš€.
